Since Virgo didn't have a blade, Periwinkle runs and throws herself onto De=
pp's blade. Depp stares at this. Virgo stands there staring.

Virgo: I don'=
t have a blade...

Periwinkle was very much dead Jim....
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: Hollywood Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Thursday, February 21, 2002 3:44 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can yo=
u dig it, Chivtrons?...


  Shrapnel was hit by the fireball. He gasps loud=
ly and changed to robot mode. Chop Shop changed as well, hearing the shots =
coming, but in mid change he is hit by a fireball. He is blasted forward an=
d slides through the sand, leading an in motion print of his body. Shrapnel=
 charges up a lightning blast and fires it at Apocalypse.

  Bombshell send=
s a signal to Periwinkle, telling her to run straight into Virgo's blade...=


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, February 21, 2002 3:13 AM
    Subject: Re:=
 Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


    McGowan stares. She was s=
ick of waiting.

    McGowan: 8 9 10!

    McGowan punches Brown in the jaw=
 and throws him to the ground so Chop Shop and Shrapnel can start their fea=
st. Brown didn't move though. Since no one was bothering to help him, he de=
cided to accept his death even though he horrified of death, especially by =
being eaten.

    Virgo: Uh...

    Virgo looks at Depp's kitana. She stare=
s at the long slightly curved blade, sticking to the side and up a little. =
She smiles.

    Virgo: Make her run and throw herself onto the blade!

   =
 Virgo points to the kitana.

    Lee fires 2 fireballs towards the chivtro=
n base. Barrymore fires at the chivtron base 5 times. Birdbot's grenades cl=
ick and both explode. The fiery blaze rockets towards the chivtron base. Pa=
pertron fires 2 missiles towards the chivtron base.

    Papertron: FER!...=


    McGowan: Hear this Shitrons! Whip out the barbeque sauce! Because you=
 Shitrons have never been deader!...

    McGowan turns to watch Chop Shop =
and Shrapnel feast on Brown as well as to see Periwinkle perform her trick =
after being given the command...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
From: Narrator 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, Febru=
ary 17, 2002 3:09 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtr=
ons?...


      Bombshell: What next?

      Chop Shop transform to beats m=
ode, so does Shrapnel. The autoguns shoot Shrapnel right in the ass and mak=
e him run forward...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: *=
Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, February=
 17, 2002 12:34 AM
        Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtr=
ons?...


        OOC: Airly, you better reply to those shots soon. I don't=
 care if you don't want to lose, I'm sick of your moding!!

        IC:

  =
      Periwinkle stares and starts crapping. A large pile of crap now sits =
on the ground. She turns, dropping to her knees. She buries her face in the=
 pile and starts eating away.

        McGowan: Hear this you shit eaters! =
Get out here and fight!

        Virgo was in a laughing spell, pointing to=
 Periwinkle. The others, too, could not help but laugh.

        McGowan: A=
nd, now! You will come out by the time I count to 10, or Brown will be inge=
sted and digested!...1....2....3....4....5.....6.....7......

          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
          From: Narrator 
          To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 8:03 AM
       =
   Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


          Bomb=
shell: Of course!

          He sends a signal to the cerebro shell in Peri=
winkle's head, it tells her to crap and eat it.

          Bombshell: Nobod=
y has as much fun as me...

            ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
       From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            =
Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
            Subject: Re: Insectic=
ons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


            McGowan: Hmm...You got a p=
oint there....He is shit....Well, think it over and let me know.

         =
   Brown was quite relieved that nothing happened yet. McGowan then whisper=
ed to him.

            McGowan: Don't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in my =
hands is sure to die....

            Periwinkle dances around like a fool.=
 She does the mambo and also dances like Rikishi Phatu.

            Virgo =
and the others laugh.

            Virgo: Make her eat her own crap!...

  =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Narrator 
   =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, Februa=
ry 16, 2002 5:11 AM
              Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it,=
 Chivtrons?...


              Chop Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a d=
ung beetle? I don't know, it'd be pretty cool, actually.

              Bar=
rage was hit by a shot from the base. He totally ignored Apocalypse and aim=
ed a gun at the shields. He was hit by another shot, but then fired 2 missi=
les at the base. Ransack holds his hand out and a charge comes out of his w=
rist. He pressed a button as it lands in his hand, and then throws it at th=
e base. It's set to explode when the timer ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 s=
hots from the base and gasps.

              Bombshell: Hee hee hee! What s=
hould I make her do? Dance!

              He sends out a signal to the she=
ll in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

                ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                From: *Orchid* 
                To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 3:51 AM=

                Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


=
                OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, re=
ply to my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything seems to =
go on very casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it i=
s McGowan's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

         =
       IC:

                Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into spa=
ce after the cerebro shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombshell'=
s slave...

                McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virg=
o, Birdbot and Papertron are struck by the several shots but hold their gro=
und. On the other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore=
 with a sidejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She r=
emembered that although Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

             =
   McGowan: I hope you Shitrons know that there is going to be another deat=
h over here! Your precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

            =
    Depp passes Brown to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 sh=
ots, Barrymore fire off 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 =
plasma shots, Birdbot fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots.=
 McGowan smiled, watching all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron =
base. McGowan turns to the Insecticons.

                McGowan: Hey, if s=
omeone doesn't come out soon, would you mind eating this guy?

            =
    Brown eyes widened and hoped that the Insecticons would do something le=
ss brutal...

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
     From: Airshadow Nightlight 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
                  Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 1:50 AM
           =
       Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


          =
        OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll post with Aerotaur. 

      =
            Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

                  "Stop littl=
e one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and left her in Nightlight'=
s arms. 

                  "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity.=
 

                  "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the base's def=
ences. 

                  The external defences turned on and fired agains=
t the Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
